docs.lead_paragraph: O.K., so I don’t meditate. Stop judging me. There are other ways to achieve the same goals.

headline.main: Can We End the Meditation Madness?

docs.abstract: Adam Grant Op-Ed article highlights research that shows stress-reducing benefits people claim to receive from meditation are easily acquired from other activities; calls on those who constantly recommend meditation to realize it is not cure for all ills for all people.
docs.snippet: O.K., so I don’t meditate. Stop judging me. There are other ways to achieve the same goals.

docs.lead_paragraph: The hottest tool in biology has scientists using words like revolutionary as they describe the long-term potential: wiping out certain mosquitoes that carry malaria, treating genetic diseases like sickle-cell, preventing babies from inheriting a life-threatening disorder.

docs.lead_paragraph: An ex-felon accused of practicing medicine without a license in Las Vegas described himself as a former porn actor and producer who follows an anti-authority sovereign citizen philosophy and learned to perform surgery from online videos, authorities said Thursday.

headline.main: Unlicensed 'Doctor' in Vegas Says He's Self-Taught Sovereign

headline.main: Ask Well: Getting Shingles Despite the Shingles Vaccine

docs.abstract: A reader asks: I got the shingles shot and still got shingles. How come?
